              sympathize
               
              with
              
              the
               
              mastiffs
               
              in
               
              robustious
               
              and
               
              rough
               
              coming
               
              on
              ,
              
              leaving
               
              their
               
              wits
               
              with
               
              their
               
              wives
              .
               
              And
               
              then
               
              give
              
              them
               
              great
               
              meals
               
              of
               
              beef
               
              and
               
              iron
               
              and
               
              steel
              ,
               
              they
              
              will
               
              eat
               
              like
               
              wolves
               
              and
               
              fight
               
              like
               
              devils
              .

speaker: ORLÉANS
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              but
               
              these
               
              English
               
              are
               
              shrewdly
               
              out
               
              of
              
              beef
              .

speaker: CONSTABLE
text:
Then
               
              shall
               
              we
               
              find
               
              tomorrow
               
              they
               
              have
              
              only
               
              stomachs
               
              to
               
              eat
               
              and
               
              none
               
              to

              .
               
              Now
               
              is

              to
               
              arm
              .

              ,
               
              shall
               
              we
               
              about
               
              it
              ?

speaker: ORLÉANS
text:
It
               
              is
               
              now

              o’clock
              .
               
              But
              ,

              me
               
              see
              ,
               
              by

              We
